name: Goemon: Shin Sedai Shuumei
description:
Goemon: Shin Sedai Shūmei! (ゴエモン 新世代襲名!) is a game in the Goemon series released for the PlayStation on December 20, 2001 in Japan. It is a spin-off of the original Ganbare Goemon series.
In February 2002, a port of this game was released for the Game Boy Advance titled Goemon: New Age Shutsudō! (ゴエモン　ニューエイジ出動!) with various modifications and cuts made from the original PlayStation version.
Neither version was released outside Japan.
